name: alakazite
effect: Held: Allows Alakazam to Mega Evolve into Mega Alakazam.
short_effect: Held: Allows Alakazam to Mega Evolve into Mega Alakazam.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Alakazam hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
